high_descs: Turn around completely, walk forward a few steps, then turn right and walk up to the nightstand.
Pick up the clock that is sitting on the nightstand.
Turn around completely, walk forward a few steps, turn to the right, walk to the wall, then turn to the right to face the desk.
Turn on the lamp that is sitting on the desk.
tasks.task_desc: Examine an alarm clock using the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and walk forward just past the bed, then turn right and walk to the small night stand to the left of the bed.
Pick up the alarm clock from the night stand.
Turn left and walk to the lamp on the left side of the desk.
Turn on the lamp.
tasks.task_desc: Examine an alarm clock by the light of a desk lamp.

high_descs: look down and turn around to your left then go right at the edge of the bed walk towards the night stand
pick up alarm clock from night stand
turn left and turn around  walk forward and then turn right and walk towards the trash can  turn right towards the table
shine the light from the alarm clock onto the table
tasks.task_desc: to shine alarm clock light on the table

high_descs: go to the middle of the desk
pick up the ink pen between the clocks
put the pen in the cup between the clocks
pick up the cup with the pen
take the cup to the nightstand to the right of the desk
put the cup on the stand
tasks.task_desc: put a coffee cup with a pen in it on the nightstand

high_descs: Turn around to face the desk.
Pick up the pen on the desk.
Place the pen in the cup on the desk.
Pick up the cup with a pen in it.
Step right to face the side table.
Place the cup on the side table.
tasks.task_desc: To put a pen in a cup plus move it to the side table.

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the desk, facing it.
Pick up the pen behind the black mug.
Place the pen in the mug.
Pick up the mug.
Walk two steps right.
Place the mug on the nightstand by the bed, on top of the CD.
tasks.task_desc: Place a mug with a pen in it on a nightstand.

high_descs: Walk to the right side of the desk in front of you.
Pick up the pen closest to the front of the laptop on the desk.
Walk to the left side of the same desk.
Put the pen in the mug that is on the desk.
Pick up the mug from the desk.
Turn right and walk to the night stand that is to the left of the bed.
Put the mug on the night stand, to the left of the keys.
tasks.task_desc: Put a mug with a pen in it on a night stand.

high_descs: Turn right and go to the bed, then turn left and go toward the wall, then turn left to face the desk.
Pick up the leftmost pen on the desk.
Turn left and step forward, then turn right and go to the wall, then turn right to face the desk.
Put the pen in the mug on the desk.
Pick up the mug from the desk.
Turn around and move forward, then turn left and go to bed, then turn left to face the nightstand.
Put the mug on the nightstand.
tasks.task_desc: Put a mug with a pen in it on the nightstand.

high_descs: walk to face right side of desk
pick up white pen from desk
walk to face desk
put pen inside cup on desk
pick up cup from desk
walk to face night stand
put cup on night stand
tasks.task_desc: put cup and pen on night stand

high_descs: Turn around and go to the desk.
Pick up a book on the desk.
Turn around and go to the bed.
Put the book on the bed.
Turn around and go to the desk.
Pick up a book on the desk.
Turn around and go to the bed.
Put the book on the bed.
tasks.task_desc: Move the books from the desk to the bed.

high_descs: Turn around, go straight, then turn right to face the desk.
Pick up the book on the desk, to the right.
Turn around, then go left to approach the bed.
Put the book in the center of the bed.
Turn around and go to the desk behind you.
Pick up the book on the desk.
Go to the bed to your right.
Place the book on the bed, in front of the pillow.
tasks.task_desc: Put the books on the bed.

high_descs: walk to face corner with tennis racket and plant
pick up tennis racket from floor
walk to face left side of bed
put tennis racket on bed
tasks.task_desc: put tennis racket on bed

high_descs: Turn around to face the corner of the room and look down at the floor.
Pick up the tennis racket leaning against the wall to the left of the plant.
Turn around, hang a right at the edge of the bed and walk to the side of the bed on the right.
Put the tennis racket in the middle of the bed between two books.
tasks.task_desc: Place a tennis racket on a bed.

high_descs: Turn around to face the wall and floor.
Pick up the tennis racket from the floor.
Turn and walk around the bed, hanging a right, stopping to face the bed before the nightstand.
Set the tennis racket down on the middle of the bed.
tasks.task_desc: Move the tennis racket from the floor to the middle of the bed.

high_descs: Walk to the bed, then walk to the right of the bed into the corner with the tennis racket.
Pick up the tennis racket on the floor.
Walk around the bed, to the side you were originally on.
Place the racket on the bed to the right of the pink pillow.
tasks.task_desc: Place a tennis racket on a bed.

high_descs: Turn right and walk forward then turn left and walk up to the tennis racket in the corner
Pick up the tennis racket from the floor
Turn around and walk around to face the side of the bed
Put the tennis racket on the bed
tasks.task_desc: Put the tennis racket on the bed

high_descs: Make a right, then a left around the bed to reach the corner of the room.
Pick up the tennis racket from the floor.
Turn around, making a right around the bed to face it.
Set the tennis racket down in the middle of the bed.
tasks.task_desc: Move the tennis racket from the floor to the bed.

high_descs: Turn left and walk to the wall, then turn left and walk to the corner.
Pick up the tennis racket from the floor.
Turn around and walk to the far corner of the bed then turn right and walk to the bed stand and turn right to face the bed.
Put the racket on the bed in between the pillow and the book.
tasks.task_desc: Put a tennis racket on the bed.

high_descs: turn left and walk to the end of the room, then take a left and walk to the other end of the room
grab the tennis racket off of the floor there
turn around and walk over the foot of the bed, then take a right and walk over to the side of the bed on your right
place the tennis racket on top of the bed
tasks.task_desc: place a tennis racket on top of the bed

high_descs: Go left and then left again to face the racket and plant in the corner.
Pick the racket up from the corner of the room.
Turn around and go right and then right again and turn to face the bed.
Put the racket on the bed.
tasks.task_desc: Put a racket on a bed.

high_descs: Move to the right side of the desk to the left of the window
Pick up a pen from the desk
Turn to the right of you
Put the pen in a cup on the end table
Pick up the cup with pen from the end table
Move to the middle of the desk to the left
Put the cup on the desk
tasks.task_desc: Put a cup with a pen on the desk to the left of the bed.

high_descs: Turn to the right, go forward, turn to the left, go to the night stand, turn to the left and go to the desk
Pick up the pen that is on the right behind the box of tissues.
Turn to the night stand that is on the right.
Put the pen in the leftmost cup on the night stand.
Pick up the cup that has the pen in it.
Turn around and go forward, hang a right and go to the garbage can, hang a right and go to the desk where the chair is.
Put the cup on the desk to the right of the pencil.
tasks.task_desc: Put a cup with a pen in it on a desk.

high_descs: Cross the room and head to the right side of the desk, then face the end of the desk
Pick up the right pen beside the tissue box on the desk
Turn to your right then look down face the side table
Put the pen in the mug which is closer to the desk on the table
Pick up the mug with pen on the table
Turn to your left then walk across the room, head to chair in front of the desk
Put the mug with pen on the middle side of the desk
tasks.task_desc: Put the mug with pen on the desk

high_descs: Turn left and walk to the desk.
Pick up the ink pen from the desk.
Turn back to your right to face the nightstand.
Place the ink pen in the black coffee mug on the nightstand.
Pick up the mug with the ink pen in it.
Turn around and walk toward the trash can and turn right to face the desk chair.
Set the mug to the left of the chair on the desk.
tasks.task_desc: Put an ink pen inside a coffee mug on the nightstand and move them onto the desk.

high_descs: Walk until you reach the window and then turn left to look at the desk.
Pick up the pen behind the computer on the desk.
Turn right to look at the mug on the nightstand.
Put the pen in the mug.
Pick up the mug from the nightstand.
Turn left and walk to the desk with the computer on it.
Place the mug in front of the white pen on the desk.
tasks.task_desc: Place a mug with a pen in it in front of the white pen on the desk.

high_descs: Walk to the nightstand
Turn to the left
take the pen off of the desk
Put the pen in the black mug on the nightstand
Take the black mug from the nightstand
Turn around, walk to the desk
Put the black mug on the desk
tasks.task_desc: Put the pen in the black mug, put them on the desk

high_descs: Turn to your left and move to face the bedside table straight ahead.
Pick up the disc that's on the front left corner of the table.
Bring the disc with you and move so that you're facing the large desk with the laptop on it.
Place the disc on the edge of the desk so that it's to the left of the laptop and in front of the pencils.
Turn to your left and face the waste bin.
Pick up the disc that's in the bin.
Bring the disc with you and turn to face the desk again.
Put the disc down on the edge of the desk so that it's to the right of the laptop and in front of the coffee mug.
tasks.task_desc: Move the discs to the desk.

high_descs: Turn left and go to the small wooden end table on the left side of the bed.
Pick up the CD on the top of the end table.
Turn around and go to the front of the desk with a computer on top.
Place the CD on the top of the desk near the edge on the left side of the computer.
Turn left to go to the green trash can on the floor.
Pick up the CD inside the trash can.
Turn right to go back to the desk.
Place the CD on the right side of the desk near the edge.
tasks.task_desc: Move the CDs to the desk.

high_descs: go to the desk
pick up the computer from the desk
take the computer to the lamp
turn on the lamp
tasks.task_desc: take the computer to the lamp to examine

high_descs: Turn around and go to the desk across from you.
Shut the laptop on the desk and pick it up.
Move over to the far, left end of the desk, where it meets the wall.
Turn on the lamp in the back, left corner of the desk.
tasks.task_desc: Turn on the desk lamp.

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the desk on your right, turn to face the desk
Close the laptop that is sitting on the desk and pick it up
Turn left and walk to the wall then turn right and face the desk
Turn on the lamp that is sitting on the desk
tasks.task_desc: Examine a laptop under a lamp

high_descs: Move across the room to the left side of the wood desk where the lamp is
Turn on the lamp sitting on top of the desk
Pick up the tissue box to the right of the pen on the desk

high_descs: walk towards the desk, turn left, take a step, turn right,
turn the lamp on
pick up the tissue box that is on the desk

high_descs: Move to the desk ahead of you
Turn on the lamp
Pick up the tissue from the desk
tasks.task_desc: Inspect the tissue with the lamp on the desk.

high_descs: Turn to the right, to face the night stand next to the bed.
Pick up the box of tissues on the night stand.
Turn around, move forward, then turn right to go toward the wall, then turn right to face the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
tasks.task_desc: Look at a box of tissues in the light.

high_descs: take a step forward and turn to the right and go to the night stand
pick up the box of tissue
turn to the left twice and go forward a few steps and turn to the right and go to the wall and turn to the right and go to the desk
turn on the lamp light on the desk

high_descs: Turn right and walk slightly forward to the night stand with the tissue box.
Pick up the tissue box from the night stand.
Turn left and walk to the lamp on the left side of the desk.
Turn on the lamp.

Pick up the tennis racket leaning against the wall.
Turn around and walk towards the green trash can, hang a right at the trash can and walk to the desk.
Turn on the lamp located at the left rear of the desk top.

Pick up the racket on the floor
Turn around to your left walk straight then head to the table with a lamp
Turn on the lamp

high_descs: Turn left and step toward the wall, then turn left and walk towards the wall.
Pick up the tennis racket that is leaning against the wall.
Turn around and walk toward the wall, then turn right and walk to the desk.
Turn on the lamp that is on the desk.

high_descs: Turn around and cross the room to stand in front of the racket on the floor.
Pick the racket up from the floor.
Turn around and cross the room to stand in front of the lamp on the desk.
Turn the lamp on.

high_descs: Cross the room to stand in front of the plant in the corner just beyond the bed.
Pick up the tennis racket from the floor.

Turn on the light on the desk while still holding the racket.

high_descs: Turn around and go to the corner.
Pick up the tennis racket on the floor.
Turn around and go to the desk.
Turn on the lamp.
tasks.task_desc: Use the light from the lamp to look at the tennis racket.

Pick up the CD on the desk.
Turn around, then turn left, then go forward, then turn left to face the night stand.
Place the CD on the night stand, behind the box of tissues.

Pick up the CD from the left side of the desk.
Turn right and go to the night table.
Put the CD down on the night table.

Pick up the CD from the table
Turn right go to the Night stand.

Take the CD from the desk
Head to the bed

Move to stand in front of the night stand.

close the computer and pick it up
